content: Hi all #implementers. I'm working on a project extracting clinical data out of the EHR. The reference data set is defined in the cathPCI NCDR dataset (https://cvquality.acc.org/docs/default-source/pdfs/2019/01/10/cathpci-v5-data-collection-form-revision-3-uploaded-jan-10-2019.pdf?sfvrsn=b85981bf_2). For this project, I'm looking for some validation if I mapped all the collected information to the correct FHIR resources. #storage for FHIR
